column1: # This is to demultiplex each sequencing run and to permit merging data from
# across runs. Specify the pool, the barcode, and the SampleID. SampleIDs must
# be distinct, as you get a BPS well call per sample. Barcodes are specified as
# their official name in Guppy demultiplexer, using official Nanopore kits.
# PoolIDs must match what's specified in the config file.
